layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-12, p-16, p-24 for section padding.
layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Service Catalog. Asymmetrical layouts for Hero.

buttons.primary: bg-eureka-green-900 text-white hover:bg-eureka-green-800 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-eureka-green-900 text-eureka-green-900 bg-transparent hover:bg-eureka-green-50 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium

cards.style: bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-[0_4px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] border border-transparent hover:border-eureka-green-100 transition-colors

header.style: sticky top-0 z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-gray-100
header.nav: Hidden on mobile, Flex on desktop. Links: text-sm font-medium text-gray-600 hover:text-green-900

hero.layout: Two column: Left Text, Right Masonry Collage
hero.title:
Reparaciones del hogar,
sin el estrés.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Ensure 3:1 contrast for large text and 4.5:1 for small text.
Cards must have generous internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use #1A4D2E (Deep Green) or #2C332E (Dark Grey) instead.
Interactive elements must have hover states (opacity change or lift).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js to include the 'eureka' color palette.
2. Install 'lucide-react' for icons if not present.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sticky header and footer.
4. Implement the Hero section using a Masonry or uneven grid for the images.
5. Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the respective sections.
6. Ensure all text is in Spanish as requested.
7. Add 'data-testid' to all buttons and inputs.
